concept.title: Custom HTML plug-ins
concept.shortdesc: For more complex customizations, you can create custom DITA-OT plug-ins that build on the default XHTML and HTML5 transformations, bundle custom stylesheets, modify the HTML markup, or override other aspects of HTML processing.

conbody.note: These examples are not intended to be used as-is, but illustrate basic techniques you can use in your own plug-ins.
